website_summaries.verdict: This versatile humidifier, which can also be used as a diffuser for essential oils, stands out for being simple to operate.
pros: simply pour water in at the top
Can be used with essential oils
Choose from high-mist and low-mist mode
Seven gentle colors for setting the mood
cons: It's not as quiet as some other choices

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A MUST HAVE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this humidifier!!! I have really bad allergies which often causes me to have a sore throat & sometimes a bit of nasal congestion but this humidifier removed both of these problems. I also love the fact that it is an essential oil diffuser as well. At night, I use either eucalyptus or peppermint oil because it clears up all of the congestion & I typically use lavender oil throughout the day. This is an amazing product & I would highly recommended it to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phenique Lester

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. As a nice amount of mist coming out and has two settings. It isn’t a quiet as I was hoping but I do like it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! I’ve used multiple cool mist humidifiers that always seem to wet my floor and the mist doesn’t evaporate into the air. This humidifier is amazing! I bought it for my sons room, he has asthma and my dr said to get one. It has been great!! We’ll worth the money. Plus it really diffuses essential oils as well. Love it! Will be purchasing another one on the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: No more nose bleeds.....
customer_reviews.text: I needed a humidifier because my nose has been bleeding due to dry cold air. When I wake up in the morning there are blood clots in my nose and it becomes really sensitive to touch. The first night of using it, I noticed that it's easier to breathe and the morning after, the blood clots from my nose are way less. After few nights of using it, my nose doesn't bleed anymore and I can breathe better at night. So far, it is working very well for me and it helped me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE! Extremely quiet- and I don’t even notice it’s on- which works great having a baby in my room! Most diffusers don’t push much out and this one does the job. It wasn’t super small like most I’ve ordered either- which saves me the trouble of filling it up more than once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with this humidifier. The size is perfect, not too big, not too small. The changing light is a bonus, sets a relaxing mood in the bedroom for our baby! Probably the nicest humidifier I’ve boughten
customer_reviews.author: Youngs

customer_reviews.title: New favorite humidifier/diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this humidifier yesterday and plugged it in for the night, what a difference! We love this humidifier bc it runs all night long, it has a strong mist setting, and the lights are a plus! So far we haven’t had any leak issues like many of the other ones we had, and it has made a big difference in our dry bedroom. We highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is good
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the water pools at the top of the lid when set on high. Customer service is great and sent a replacement. I just use low settings.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect one for both kids & adults! Eye dryness got much better after using this. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Youngkyo J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this. I used it for about 3 days for about an hour each time and after that it stopped working. I tried adding water thinking it might have been too low but that did not help and I also switched outlets and got nothing. It was a little noisy when it did work, even on night time mode. I was really excited for this and now I’m extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get
customer_reviews.text: I would nit recommend this. I’ve had it for 2 weeks and it doesn’t make a difference in the humidity of my bedroom at all. It doesn’t matter if its in high it doesn’t make a difference. I had an old cheap humidifier that actually made a difference when you woke up. With this one you wake up congested etc like nothing was ever there.
customer_reviews.author: paul simms

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and soaked our floor and carpet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this humidifier for my daughter's room. We had to move it away from the monitor because the noise from the humidifier was being picked up by the monitor. I put it on the floor with a towel under it (rather than the initial bookshelf i had it on) and when I came in this morning the towel, carpet, and hardwood floor were soaking around the humidifier. The lid of the humidifier also had pooled water on it. We followed the hard-to-read instruction manual to the T and still had issues and were disappointed, so we'll be returning this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i can breathe again
customer_reviews.text: We can turn on the heat and the air isn't dry, so i can actually breathe and be warm. i love the changing colors of the humidifier. Very quiet. i wish i had made this purchase a long time ago. i've now ordered aroma therapy oils to enhance the experience of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Berrong

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it doesn't just settle on the floor....
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful humidifier that puts out a lot of moisture. However, it seems to just "bubble" out of the top sort of like dry ice and fall to the ground. I'm not sure it's actually getting into the air? I have it on a desk in my classroom, and my kids were enthralled. They loved the light feature and asked me to diffuse oils in it tomorrow (I'll oblige, and probably update my review). It's not a bad deal compared to other cool mist humidifier/diffusers, I'm just not sure its actual functionality is the same as a different (more expensive) brand I have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Randle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and easy to handle! I purchased this for my infant son. I've had it for a few weeks now and so far it's been working great. It's quiet, very simple to add water to it, the functions are simple and easy to control. The light feature is beautiful. I havent used any aromatherapy oils in it just yet but I do believe it's gonna make me like this humifier even more. I gave it 4 stars because I'm not to sure about the position of the opening where the mist flows out (on top)...I'm not too sure if it circulates throughout the room like I want. Maybe it does...I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This sits next to our bed and we use it every single night...the slight humming helps me fall asleep and the mist it lets out is great. The first time I filled it with water, I must have poured too much...even though it was below the marked line...it would turn on, but nothing was coming out. I poured a little bit out and voila! The color changing is nice too, if you’re wanting that. For the money, I’d say this was a great investment...definitely doesn’t feel cheap, and has helped me from getting sick in this crazy Michigan weather!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kaba

customer_reviews.title: Great product for
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to use, pretty design and works great. My cats love it too. 😁
customer_reviews.author: The Kayler

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this humidifier last month and final had the chance to use it this week. The humidifier itself is nice looking and easy to fill. I didn't notice an issue until the next morning when I woke up to a big pile of water everywhere. My dresser was soaked and the unit was covered in water. I had to wipe everything down with a towel for a good 5-10 minutes to dry everything. As for the noise, it seemed like it was louder then it should be. I think I must have received a defected humidifier. I wish I would have returned it to get a replacement but I'm afraid its too late.
customer_reviews.author: amanda winner

customer_reviews.title: First unit defective
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for two days, then developed a loud whiney sound and started leaking. The directions were followed to a T and it was not user error on my part. Amazon customer support was amazing and is shipping me a new one and a free shipping label to return the defective unit, I will update once the new one arrives. * update* second unit works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for diffusing oil
customer_reviews.text: It does not really replace a humidifier as its water output is minimal, however it is very cool to look at and the oil diffuser does work making the room smell wonderful. Mists more when the water level drops for some reason as well, so I just keep it low as it takes a day to go through 1/3 filled of the 2.5 L. In the video you can see that it is not misting as much b/c the container is half filled.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK D.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I got this for my 2yo’s room to help with some respiratory issues when she’s sick. I only recently received it so haven’t figured out if you can select one stationary colour yet. For now it’s rotating through the rainbow, which my toddler is a fan of. You can use essential oils in this product. The water tank is large as well so it will easily run through the whole night and then some without needing to be refilled.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is amazing. I bought a different brand and that one was a mess and didn't work. This one is so easy to use and you can add oils to it. It's very quite and the night lights are perfect, very soothing and not too bright. This has helped me with a recent flu and asthma flare up I had. Wonderful product and I'm so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Britton Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a couple of weeks then the motor got LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: This unit was working just fine for the first two weeks. Even on the lowest setting, it dispersed a good amount of moisture and fragrance (using essential oils). Then after about two weeks, the motor began whirring as loud as a blow dryer. The first time it happened, I unplugged it then restarted it and the noise stopped. Now, it's constant. I hadn't allowed any water into the section that warns you not to fill. I'd cleaned it. And I've moved it around, just in case it was sitting on or next to something I didn't realize. Nothing has worked. Also, the noise continues after I turn off the unit. Disappointed I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: detroitsportsgal

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for full nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver the past few days. The house gets so dry and it was hard to sleep at night, but this humidifier has been so helpful next to my bed to keep the air moist. I have been able to sleep through the night. I like that there is an auto shut off so it's not going on for too long, and I like that in the future I can also use essential oils with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Rios

customer_reviews.title: What a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I had tried for several years to find a humidifier to help with my sinus problems, especially when you have a gas heating system which makes the air very dry. This humidifier has worked magic as I now have no problems breathing during the night. My nose doesn't get stopped up and I want to say thanks. Easy to fill, easy to clean, and love the cool colors you can turn on if you wish. Also, for those who want to know, I have had no problem whatsoever with any type of water problems that you might think occurs with a mist humidifier. I LOVE IT. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Really great looking in a living room. Doesn’t look ugly or take up a lot of space. I love the colors. Very modern. It started working the second I plugged in and it makes a lot of steam!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Works for like two days
customer_reviews.text: Before you go and say "well maybe you just got a defective one", let me stop you. I bought two of them, and they both worked great for two or three days.... After that, when you turn them on, they make this awful squealing sound and you have the slap the $#!& out of them to make them run quietly again. So yeah, the lights are cool and all that, but the noise is unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after using it a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful product until it stopped working after only a couple of uses. I really wanted to like it. I bought this less than a month ago and used it for about 1-2 weeks before I had to put it away since I was hosting parties for the holidays and needed it out of the way. I followed all instructions about being careful with emptying out the water, not getting water in the air filter, etc. I just took it out and tried to use it again, and it won't start. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: dvt0882

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this machine for about a week. Until it started making this random noise. Read this in another review and should have believed it. Really upset.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ridgeway

customer_reviews.title: Homasy
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, it works well. Thanks to the seller. I put 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Not for large rooms. Quiet/not totally silent.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. It is not steady on a flat surface though which is just ridiculous and points to bad manufacturing (it has a slight wobble). I keep it clean. It does not have a removable reservoir so you have to follow instructions regarding the water. It is quiet enough. If you have a large room, this may not be for you. A small to med. Bedroom it would be fine for. It holds 2.5 liters of water and will run all night on full power mode.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Poor function
customer_reviews.text: I have tried for about 1 month. I clean it and change the filtered water daily. The mist is very light and barely humidifies the small bedroom, even on high level. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Sleep better!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice humidifier and works well in my bedroom. I have a big bedroom and high ceilings but still works great! I love the quiet, the soft pastel colors and I do sleep better, breathe better.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Hated this humidifier but the vendor replaced it with a better one for free
customer_reviews.text: I started out liking this humidifier because of the top-fill feature and the changing mood lights, which were oddly meditative. However, within a couple of days it started to make an annoying buzzy sound. I contacted the vendor directly and they promptly sent me a replacement of a different model described as "whisper-quiet" and it has been wonderful. The only thing I miss is the mood light! But the humidifier tank is larger, still is top-fill, and has a nice, soft white-noise hum. I was particularly pleased with the vendor's quick and courteous solution to the problem and would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is awesome. I was waking up with dry eyes and super chapped lips once it started getting cold. I bought this humidifier and can definitely tell the difference. Also, love the style of it and fits on a small nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design, super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is awesome. It is almost completely silent so it doesn’t disturb me while I sleep. It has a nice calming light effect to help me relax before I go to sleep. It also does everything a regular humidifier should do, keeps the air nice and moist as it helps us breathe a little bit more clearly it makes my skin feel more hydrated. This is definitely a humidifier I would suggest others.
customer_reviews.author: amber stevens

customer_reviews.title: Issue with Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I have had the humidifier for about 3 weeks now and I am generally pleased with it. The control settings are nice however just recently it has begun making a loud noise once turned on and does not go away until machine is off (therefore I am not using it anymore). I tried reaching out to amazon customer service and they have been no help and now I have reached out the the manufacturer with hopes of resolving this issue. Prior to this unfortunate issue, I was a big fan of the product and would’ve recommended. Now I’m not so certain I would. This is still brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for humidifier, but works.
customer_reviews.text: The mist humidifier works nice for the price. The mist is nice and cool (good for summer, bad for winter). I noticed the mist doesn’t evaporate, seems to leave a “haze” suspended in the air. The lid collects condensation and pools on the top. If to close to the ground, the vapor will fall to the floor making it wet. I moved mine from a nightstand to a dresser and the wet floor was eliminated. Cleaning is not bad, but take caution not to get internals wet, as it’s a simple unit. Not the best for adding humidity, but it works nice on low setting to diffuse essential oils into the air.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it! No more dry skin in the morning!
customer_reviews.text: I had a humidifier before and it was leaving leaks in the morning on the floor and decided to give this one a try and I love it. No leaks on the floor, works very quiet, you can't even hear it at night and also has a great night mode for no light at all and during the day you can use the light mode and it switches colors by itself. Very slick design as well, looks like a part of the furniture. Also has a great option to use essential oils for smell diffusing, will have to give that a try as well. Over all very happy with this humidifier!
customer_reviews.author: Karina L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product from a very cool company
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite humidifier, and the company is seriously awesome. After a few months of use, our unit started flashing red and it wouldn’t turn back on. After troubleshooting back and forth with someone through email, they just offered to send us a new unit. It has a large tank, so it lasts around 18 hours on high power, and I love putting a few drops of essential oils in the tank too. It’s beautiful, and I love the different mist settings, and that you can turn on sleep mode so there’s no light on overnight. We will use this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: wrman32

customer_reviews.title: Weird noise
customer_reviews.text: So overall I love the colors, the ease of cleaning it, the mist levels, the easy top fill. However about a week after having this product I turned it on high and it made this horrible sound. It’s since done that on every setting multiple times. It sounds like the motor is on overdrive. I shut it off, clean it out and refill and start over. Sometimes it makes the sound again sometimes it doesn’t and just takes right off working. So I don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Gebauer

customer_reviews.title: REVISED REVIEW: making loud noise .................  very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: 3/23/20. bought on 1/30/20. Worked great. Than about 2 weeks ago started making a terrible grinding noise. Cant sleep with that! Should last longer than 6 weeks. If you have fixed problem would like to try again. If not would like money back. Should not be hard to buy this, it's not a computer or TV. This is my second brand to try. First one from different manufacturer no one was home to talk to or get it resolved. Easy to fill, clean and use. put out a wide mist that really works. Like that you can also add oil.
customer_reviews.author: cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Can be used with essential oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these humidifiers. I love that I can put essential oil in the water. When the children are sick with a cold, I put some eucalyptus essential oil and it is sent in mist of the humidifier. I love it. Also, the children love the lights. The lights are beautiful. The reason why I put four stars is because I wish the electric cord could be removed from the humidifier itself when I need to fill it with water. Also, I wish we could use it only for the lights as the children love the lights. But overall, great humidifier and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until two things occurred. First, one of the plastic feet that keeps device from scratching surface of dresser came off.... really not a big deal unless you have a toddler who puts Everything in his mouth. I pray I vacuumed the little piece up. I pulled the rest of them off. The second problem was the motor started making these awfully loud noises when turning on and it wouldn’t work. I returned it for full credit.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier, bright light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little humidifier that works just as it says. The settings are easy to control and my niece loves the adjustable lights. My only issues are that it gives off a bright light (not the adjustable lights) at all times. I sleep in the pitch black dark and this light makes it hard for me to sleep. I also wouldn't reccommend it for a kids room because it doesn't have a lock when it is closed so its basically a little bucket of water. Other than that it works really well and i am very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Krh10

customer_reviews.title: WATER
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed, its makes a complete mess by the morning. I have to clean up every morning with a towel. I had it on my night stand and by the time morning came everything was soaked my books were warped my phone thank god still worked but covered with water. I tried it on medium but it doesnt even seem to do anything on medium. Def wouldnt have bought if i knew this was what i was getting. Update: doesn't make such a mess now but really loud for first 10 mintues.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Loud, worked great for about 30 days
customer_reviews.text: (UPDATE) 2 days after the Amazon return window the thing started sounding like a lawnmower. Clearly something is not working properly. After contacting the company they responded right away and promised to ship a new one. I will update again once it comes in. Great customer service so went from 1 star to 3 for that.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 different diffusers before with huge disappointment. But Homasy has REALLY brought me to trust a real diffuser! I was first surprised at the packaging, the actual size is amazing. Wait until you turn this on, it's like a mini volcano (without the noise). I used about 10 drops of citrus oil and you can feel the fresh breeze. The noise is non-existent, the touch sensitive buttons are cool, the light is a soft glow (it can be turned off, cycled, or 1 light only) I've used this daily for 2 weeks, GET THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Steady stream
customer_reviews.text: I bought it almost a week ago and it has been great.Its easy to setup and refill. You have the option to turn on the "night light" which is an array of colors when its on. The light is not too bright so It doesn't affect sleep if you're a person who is sensitive to lights when going to bed. There's 3 levels of steam you can choose from ranging from high to night mode. Super easy to operate. Its been a godsend so far. In the video it shows the colors of the light when its on.
customer_reviews.author: Roushelle Pitter

customer_reviews.title: Weak Mist but pretty colors if you like that!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier never worked for me. I live in Ohio so I have to have the heat on 24 hours. Since my nose would get dry when I would sleep I bought it for my bedroom. My bedroom is about 120 sq. feet and this size humidifier would be the right size. I also tried it with distilled water and nothing. The percentage of humidity in my room went from 16% to 21% so not much change and this is the same result I would get when I place a bowl full of water in my room. I decided to return it , unfortunately it didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian C. Barro

customer_reviews.title: Better than crane! Bonus, it's a diffuser too!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars mainly because this is only easy to clean if you have decent brushes to clean it with. The water where I live tends to make things kind of slimy after a few days even when it's filtered. Maybe I should just use distilled water, but right now (during Covid-19) water is limited per person and I would much rather use that water for my 5 month old. Anywho, besides that this humidifier is awesome! I love it more than my crane humidifier and plan to buy a second for the living room. so that we can have a humidifier in each room.
customer_reviews.author: steph K

customer_reviews.title: Good diffuser. Useless humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of a diffuser and humidifier in one. Unfortunately, the humidifier did nothing for our space. We have a slightly larger bedroom but I don’t know how it would work in any room... like other reviews have said, it doesn’t shoot the mist high enough to actually disperse through the air, it drops right back down to the surface the humidifier is sitting one (hence the towel under it). I put some oils in it and the room smelled great, but not worth ruining any surface it sits on to use it just as a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a fantastic product. It relieves my allergies and makes my room smell amazing. I would highly recommend this product. I have read several reviews that the humidifier pools water on the top. I personally find that if my room is quite humid then additional moisture in the air will pool on the humidifier, but if my room is arid then it doesn't pool (which is 98% of the time). I have had the product for about 4 or 5 months and find that the product holds up great.
customer_reviews.author: Trae

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and pretty quite
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and is pretty easy to understand. Basically, just pour water in the tank (the part that changes colors) and plug it in. It's pretty quite. The light bubbling from it is kinda relaxing. It automatically changes colors and the instructions don't really explain well how to get it to stay one color (they're poorly translated). Basically, when its rotating through colors, press the light bulb button once when it gets to the color you want. Easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Human Hickory

customer_reviews.title: A Great Cool Mist Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this humidifier. Originally bought it when my youngest was sick with a stuffy nose, and it helped a lot. My oldest daughter uses it in her room now, and says she wakes up feeling much more refreshed. No more stuffy noses or dry throats. The lights are very soothing, and the control panel is easy to use. The humidifier comes apart very easily and is easy to keep clean. Not loud at all, and has a nice sleep mode that turns off the lights.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: My experience wasn’t as great as others I guess
customer_reviews.text: Pros: looks nice. holds a good amount of water. does not seem to cause water to collect around it. Cons: The unit doesn’t always shut Off when I switch it off. It doesn’t seem to auto shut off just makes a loud noise starting when the water gets low My daughter does not seem to be any less stuffed up since we got this (this was the reason I bought it) All in all I will probably end up sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica King

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies, so I’ve always considered buying a humidifier but I never did until now. Boy, I was missing an experience! I bought two and keep one in the living room and the other in the bedroom. The tank is big and it’s enough for me to work for several days without being refilled. The product is quiet, specially in sleep mode. The lights are soothing and give a nice effect while in use. I’m feeling so much better in terms of breathing now that I have them. In resume, it’s totally worth the money in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Good when it's not loud.  Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Runs very loud sometimes. Sounds like it's broken. Sometimes it quiets itself and other times you have to turn off and restart a few times. The container for the water does not separate from the base of the unit so you need to unplug and bring the whole unit to the sink to clean out. For the price, it's ok for me to deal with the noise sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is awful. After a couple of weeks of use the motor started making this high pitched noise. We have followed every guideline, no water above the fill line, no use on cloth surfaces, etc. The 3 tap button feature doesn’t properly turn the machine off anymore and when we attempt to shut it down, we are forced to pull the power cord to stop the noise. The small amount of humidity it puts in the air isn’t even worth enduring the noise. Having only owned this humidifier for a short time, this is a huge disappointment. I would love to return it and go with another brand. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this humidifier to put in the room where my baby sleeps to hopefully help her when she is stopped up or congested. First of all, this thing pumps out steam really well and the fact that I can add essential oils to it makes it so much better because I use the “breathe easy” when she is stopped up and it fills the entire room. The lights are a neat feature that I have really come to like ass well. Overall we liked this humidifier so much that we ordered a second one. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: It seems that many reviewers had a positive experience with this humidifier. I am used to spending a hundred or so for a good one but my wife really like the features of this model. Reading the use instructions, it seems they did a pretty decent job translating from what appears to have been Mandarin although I can imagine they are still getting some raised eyebrows. Did not trust having this unit run unattended. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: V. Vanderbent

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is WAY bigger than expected for this price. I was expecting smaller since all the similar sized ones at my local stores are $35+ so I am pleasantly surprised! My husband gets horrible nosebleeds in the winter time and I knew our house was super dry. This is already making a big difference! The tank on this thing is HUGE. We've been using it every night this week and haven't had to refill it yet. The light function is pretty also. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Makes a constant loud buzzing noise
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these humidifiers. Both of them make a loud buzzing noise from the motor. At first it was just for a few minutes, or would stop after turning it off and back on, but now it is constant and keeps us up at night. We can’t even use it anymore. We’ve only had them for 2 1/2 months, but can’t return them because it’s past the allowable return date. We would appreciate at least an exchange for both of these units. $60 is a bit high for 2 humidifiers that only lasted a couple months. The last humidifier we bought lasted us 25 years. This is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new humidifier for my 5 year old's bedroom, as he gets nasty nosebleeds and the one I had was just too loud. I found this one and figured the reviews looked solid and it was a fair price. What showed up has, thus far, met and exceeded all expectations. Even on "high" this humidifier is extremely quiet--I think my ceiling fan makes more noise. It goes 3 nights before it needs a refill. The unit is fairly lightweight and is mid-sized for a humidifier, meaning I don't have to clear a ton of space for it to fit somewhere. It also looks good, which is a nice perk.
customer_reviews.author: Tonee Keating

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Update - it’s been a while but I feel like I need to say this. My product makes this horrible grinding noise whenever I turn it on more often than not. I was told that they don’t do exchanges so I paid whatever the price was for a product that doesn’t work as intended. If I could I’d give it zero stars for bad product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Not noisy and works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I add a few drops of a sleeping oil and my kid sleeps much better. Not noisy. And what is very important for me there’s nothing wet around the machine, I had that problem with the other brand ... Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ilana

customer_reviews.title: Not really liked it
customer_reviews.text: Cons: The steam isn't blowing out perfectly. It just blows out and kinda turn its way down to the table where I kept the unit. So you can see your table is wet and I had to put a cloth under the unit just not to damage my table because of this water. I bought Honeywell Cool mist from Menards again today which I really liked and used last 3 years. Pros: Looks awesome, easy to clean and fill water in. Color changes are good and sleep mode is good.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier. It's probably my top favorite purchase so far this year! The white noise is just the right amount for sleeping. The water lasts me a little more than two nights on low mode. My daughter loves the color changing feature! Combine with some essential oils and I am getting the best sleep of my life. 100% would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Allirich

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working shortly after we got it
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working shortly after we got it and is making a screeching sound. My son needs a humidifier for health reasons. I was told by Rafael when I called customer service, and he assured me that a new one would be sent to replace it. I have not heard from the company since then, I need a replacement or a refund. I haven't heard from the company since I contacted them and was assured I would get a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great...until it wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for about 2-3 months, I used it every night. It was quiet, sleep mode worked fine, easy to use and clean, etc., and then out of nowhere every time I turned it on the motor made a terrible "whirring" sound that I could do nothing to fix/stop. This happened literally out of nowhere; I hadn't dropped or damaged the humidifier and was following the instructions carefully. I have a family member who bought the same product around the same time I did and has had no issues, but I'd be cautious; it's great until it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer support!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this humidifier! It is quiet, it is dark (when on night mode) and I can use essential oils! I use this in my bedroom at night and I've been thrilled with it. I'm a light sleeper and went through several humidifiers before finding this one. It doesn't disturb my sleep in any way. Not only is the humidifier great, but so is the company's customer service. I had an issue with the humidifier, reached out to their customer service about it and they resolved it to my satisfaction right away.
customer_reviews.author: L. R.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for a humidifier. Horrible for an diffuser. The oils only last for so long because you put them directly into the tank. I have to put more oil in the tank throughout the night. I used so much oil. Doesn't blow out strong when on high either. Overall you could find better. Hate I missed the return window. Now i have 2 kids sick I can see I need better.
customer_reviews.author: Kingme

customer_reviews.title: Want to love... but the sound?
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this humidifier. It has a wonderful light that my 4 yr old loves and needs. She’s had a cool mist humidifier her whole life and it seems to help her through the cold and flu seasons. My only hang up is that after a week of use, the motor inside began to sound like it’s reving up and could burst. It takes several times of turning it on and off to get that sound to ease. We’ve tried cleaning it and more but cannot figure out why it wants to be so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while before to review this humidifier cause I wanted to see how reliable it was and I guess now it is time. I bought it cause my bedroom gets very dry during the winter and this humidifier really helped me. First of all it is very quite, and it releases a very nice amount of moist in the air. It has 3 different setting you can choose from to release moist and you can also choose the features of having it on with lights or without as you wish. You can also add essential oil and it works just fine. All in all a nice product for sure in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: manolo prandini

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This actually looks really great in my room and is not bulky. Super easy to fill and has notations on the actual item as to which side to use to dump the water. There is the added benefit that I can add my essential oils in it, which I do spell in the air. There is an option to have it produce light which is great, especially if using in a child's room as a nightlight. Over all, I would recommend and would purchase again :-)
customer_reviews.author: SugarCuppyCake

customer_reviews.title: I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite humidifier I've owned. It's extremely quiet even with being by my bedside. I can hear slight bubbling sounds but I notice sounds easier then most. Even with that I don't notice it often or am bothered by it. The entire lid comes off for easy access to clean. Only thing I don't like is it leave about 1/2 maybe less of water that you need to drain if you want to dry it out for any reason or can get yucky if your not using it continually.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Holland

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.. at first(Updated)
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed to work great for the first few weeks of operations. Now when turned on it makes a very loud humming sound and I often have to turn it on and off again several times.in order to get it to actually work. Really disappointed as the first few weeks it worked great. *Update* I increased the rating to 4 stars as the company did contact me and had amazing customer service. They immediately sent out an upgraded replacement that works great. It does not have the light feature this one has but I was really after the humidifier aspect more than caring about the light and the new unit works amazingly well for that!
customer_reviews.author: cathy knight

customer_reviews.title: Product okay, shipping was late.again
customer_reviews.text: I imagine the product is fine. I took a star away because this shipment, like four of my last five shipments, was late. I live near Jacksonville Florida, which has five - yes FIVE - huge Amazon fulfillment centers. There are a minimum of three, and as many as five, Amazon vans and trucks in my subdivision every day, but my next day stuff is rarely on them anymore. Prime seems to be a huge waste of money for me
customer_reviews.author: DaveDammitt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I loved this humidifier and how easy it is to clean, but within a few weeks it started making a weird noise when we turn it on. It sounds like there is something wrong with the motor. It just suddenly shuts off when you try to set it to sleep mode. I have never overfilled it and I’m always careful not to get water in the air vent, so I know it’s not user error. I was so excited about this humidifier and I’m disappointed it didn’t last long!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon/Alyssa Abeling

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and lengthy operation on a single fill-up
customer_reviews.text: I love the capacity ! I previously bought a smaller humidifier that always ran out of water during the middle of the night. I made the switch to this larger unit and have been very satisfied. It’s not noisy, it’s very easy to set up, and I find the colors very relaxing. I am in the process of buying multiple different units to place around the house because they really help with the air quality, especially during winter months when the heat is constantly on.
customer_reviews.author: Maciej

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to clean and assemble again NOT GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I got this product less than a year for my daughters room. I needed to do a deep clean because NO IS NOT EASY TO CLEAN REALLY DEEP!, so I disassemble all the humidifier and guess what. Was impossible to put it back together and now I can’t use it and start to getting cold and dry where i live. Also is impossible to contact customer service, so I recommend do not Get this product
customer_reviews.author: Raysha

customer_reviews.title: LOUD Motor Grinding Sound, Had It For 3 Months DON'T PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product early December. Started using it early January. I followed every precaution and direction, however, despite this, this machine has been making the loudest, most horrible motor-grinding sound EVERY TIME I turn it on. That "welded" feature makes it impossible for me or anyone else take a look at it in order to try and fix it. I truly don't trust it nor do I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can do with some design upgrades but very happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Levoit humidifier for comparison. This one is slightly more noisy but has a white sound effect on me. Easy to empty and refill -a removable cord would have made it perfect. The night light can’t turn off unless you turn the whole thing off. Slight inconveniences: the beeping sound when you push the buttons and the fact that the buttons don’t light up and you can’t see them in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I knocked off a star simply because even with descaling tubes in the container I'm having to clean this way more than I should be. This thing is quiet which is nice for sleeping kiddos. It hold a lot of water. The output is good. I wish there was a way to lock the lid on because kids can be crazy and I'm not looking forward to them accidentally knocking 2.5 Liters of water on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Constant High Pitched Whine -remdied!
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier seems to put out a lot of moisture into the air however there is a continuous high pitched whine that I can hear even over the sound of the TV. UPDATE: I emailed the company and asked if this was normal. They immediately responded saying no and shipped out a replacement. Fantastic customer service and the humidifier is worth 5 stars for price and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Nalo

customer_reviews.title: Makes bad buzzing sound
customer_reviews.text: At first this was an amazing humidifier. Until one day I turned it on and started making this loud buzzing sound. It definitely does not sound right or safe. I hope the manufacturer can solve this issue. Otherwise it would be perfect. Unfortunately I had to return and look for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: J4short06

customer_reviews.title: Humidifies ok, but makes noise after maybe a month....
customer_reviews.text: Had for about 2 months and it has started making a Loud whining sound upon start up. It was going away after 5 minutes or so but lately has been making the noise for 10 minutes or more. Definitely not able to sleep with that noise so unless we think to go turn it on before we go to bed, we haven’t been running it. I like the color changing aspect, and it still functions ok but that noise is lame...Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.  Easy to clean and very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to recommend this product. There is no noise and it has a cool mist and supe pretty lights. Its very modern and stylish. I havent put any oil yet but i am truly loving this product. Very light weight and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine Clavell

customer_reviews.title: quiet, works great
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a stay in a rehab where the air was dry, and she was anxious due to medical problems. I brought in the machine and it worked wonders. It is extremely quiet, bm and the colored lights were soothing, helping her sleep. Workers in the place were impressed--they kept coming in the room and taking pictures of it or jotting down the name of the machine. An outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Don

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean, the lid spills, and useless light settings
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price despite a few drawbacks. Impossible to clean the lid/diffuse tube. It causes the mist to smell after about a week. The lighting settings are programmed to operate only when the diffuser is on high or medium. You CANNOT have lighting with sleep mode, which is very disappointing. The lid is great for collecting pools of water which eventually spill out the sides. I drilled holes to allow the lid to drain back into the base.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Herr

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I needed it because i just moved into a new home with a wood stove and it was drying out my nose and throat. I keep this in our large living room and move it to my bedroom at night. I havent had any issues since! Also its great that you can put essential oils in it. This does not leak like other reviews said, the mist will dampen the counter area around it but thats to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Great humidifier, perfect for a bedroom. Built in night light works well, and isn't too bright. It makes a small amount of noise but I'd don't even notice it anymore. On the highest setting I've notice the water pools on the lid some while its running, not enough to make a mess, but enough to notice. This has a sleep mode, where it will turn off all lights while it runs. It will also shut off if it runs too low on water.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not good if sound-sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier works well for my 10x10 bedroom with open door to hall and bathroom. I can tell the difference in sinus dryness. It’s also easy to fill by keeping a pitcher nearby. The downside is that it emits a high-pitched noise. I’m pretty sensitive to those kind of noises so it’s a big drawback for this. I can tolerate it with earplugs in though. Good bang for the buck but if you can’t handle quiet high pitches, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: SO MANY BENEFITS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson who constantly wakes up with a bloody nose due to our very dry winter air... add to that some lavender essential oil for a restful sleep and l now have a very happy 8 year old!! The bonus is the ever-changing soft light that changes colors (so pretty!)... It makes for a wonderful night light! The unit is super quiet and the mist lasts an entire night with some to spare. Can you tell we LOVE THIS?!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Simple
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice size tank, easy to clean, and the controls for the "mood lighting" are easy to use. It would be nice if it remembered your settings but each time you turn it off you have to redo them. It only has 2 mist settings - lots or less but that's ok. There are several colors to choose from or you can let them cycle through. I haven't tried any aromatherapy drops in it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely one of my favs
customer_reviews.text: This is my first humidifier. The first night I slept like a baby. No more stuffy nose or that crazy need for water in the middle of the night. I add a few drops of essential oil to it. Smells amazing. It’s also very silent. 👍 Just remember that you have to clean your humidifier every 2 days or every time you’re adding fresh water. If you just add fresh water without cleaning the humidifier first you’ll definitely notice a sour smell when it’s on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Negan

customer_reviews.title: Good product for its price
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I wish it was more quite and for sleep mode one could switch maximum mist level. Currently you can’t switch off light indicator for high mist level and this indicator is very bright. I have really hot heating in my apartments (and I can’t adjust the level, only on/off) so this humidifier really helps to humidify air which is dried by heating. Given the cheap price (it was $25 for me with discount) rating this to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro Sydorchenko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Auto shut off. Sometimes it’s noisy for the first 5-10 minutes of use but then it gets quite so don’t be surprised the first time you use it. Love the colors which are Really soothing for children at bedtime. Got it for my child’s Congestion. Seems to be helpful. My 8 year old can refill the water level without my help. It’s really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, does the job, but I have two criticisms: 1. On the high setting it makes the floor all around it soaking wet by morning when you have it go all night. 2. On any setting it makes a pool of water on the top of the lid that gets all over when you have to take the lid off to refill it. If you stay off the high setting and are careful with removing the lid, it's actually a really decent cool mist humidifier foe the price, great for kid's room when they are congested. My daughter loves the rainbow lights.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier; easy refill
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best humidifier we’ve ever had. I bought one for my daughter, and ended up getting two more for me and my son. They are easy to fill, j(my 8 and 10 year old do it before bed each night easily) just open lid, pour in water, and push button. Make sure kids fill half full so they don’t go over the air intake spout. Simple. Thank you for creating such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mt. View Parents

product_meta.title: Homasy Cool Mist Humidifier Diffuser, 2.5L Essential Oil Diffuser, Top Fill Humidifier for Bedroom, Home and Office, Baby Humidifier with Adjustable Mist Output, Sleep Mode, Auto Shut Off
feature_bullets: ALSO AN ESSENTIAL OIL HUMIDIFIERS: Essential Oil Compatible, you can directly add some drops of essential oil into the water tank, the humidifier turns to an oil diffuser, allowing you to enjoy the fragrance and relax your mind immediately

CONVENIENT TOP-FILL DESIGN: One-piece & top-fill opening design make the humidifier easier to refill the water and clean. No need to remove the water tank anymore, just twist the cover down and directly add water through the large opening top.

AUTO SHUT OFF & RELIABLE: This cool mist humidifier for bedroom will automatically shut off with red LED light on when runs out of water. You can totally free your worry about it will dry running when you are sleeping.The automatic shut-off design always reassure you.

2 MIST LEVEL & SLEEP MODE: Sensitive touch button helps you easily change the working modes of the humidifier. There are modes to choose: high mist mode, low mist mode and sleep mode. The indicator light will be turned off in the sleep mode.

360° EFFICIENT HUMIDIFICATION: Homasy cool mist humidifier can moisturize the air for up to 30H of continuous operation, 360° uniform humidification, so you can breathe the fresh air even far away from the humidifier, smell the fresh air like you are in a forest.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars8,038 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
